From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron gasped for air, he had been digging a long while, and hadnt found
anything, he was almost out of energon, and if he didnt find anything, he
might die out in the arctic. No, he cant, he took a step back, and wound up
his fist, and shot it forward with all his might into the icy wall, a huge
rumble coming from his immences strength, as the ice cracked, and the wall
gave way, as the hundreds of tons of ice above came crashing down, and in
all the chaos, of the huge tremors, and the large amout of ice falling,
Megatron had to aim his cannon upwards, and with what remained of his
energy, fire a huge blast, to keep himself from getting buried. The stream
of raw power cut through the ice falling towards him, melting it as soon as
his power hit it. Then there was silence.

He fell to the ground, panting, his energy reserves where almost used up in
that blast, and a huge hole where all the ice fell remained, "I must get
the .... energy" he whispered, as he crawled forward.
